The New Photographers Presentation

Feb 16, 2012

This post is for the students of The New Photographers class in the Visual and Environmental Studies program at Harvard. Here, you’ll find the presentation I showed on Monday as well as links to work and resources relevant for each example. Feel free to write questions in the comments. Thanks again to Sue Jaye Johnson for inviting me to present!
